item.title: 3. Visualizar
item.description: install.packages(c("ggplot2", "sf", "ggthemes")) ## Installing packages into '/home/travis/R/Library' ## (as 'lib' is unspecified) ## also installing the dependencies 'colorspace', 'labeling', 'munsell', 'RColorBrewer', 'spData', 'e1071', 'gtable', 'lazyeval', 'plyr', 'reshape2', 'scales', 'viridisLite', 'DBI', 'units', 'classInt' ## Warning in install.packages(c("ggplot2", "sf", "ggthemes")): installation ## of package 'units' had non-zero exit status ## Warning in install.packages(c("ggplot2", "sf", "ggthemes")): installation ## of package 'sf' had non-zero exit status 1. Gr√°ficos 1.
